Row.text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pilgrimage:[ENDCOLOR] +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from Holy Sites. +25% Pressure in all nearby Cities without your majority Religion.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fire Temple:[ENDCOLOR] +3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_FOOD] Food from Temples. +25% Pressure in all nearby Cities without your majority Religion.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Holy Books:[ENDCOLOR] +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Great Works. The [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism modifier for Shared Religion is increased by 15%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Holy See:[ENDCOLOR] +1 [ICON_DIPLOMAT] Delegate in the WC for every 8 City-States. +25% Pressure in all nearby Cities without your majority Religion.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Meditation and Insight:[ENDCOLOR] Specialists generate +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science. -10% [ICON_PEACE] Faith costs for purchasing Buildings, Missionaries and Inquisitors.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Religious Art:[ENDCOLOR] Great Works generate +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. -10% [ICON_PEACE] Faith costs for purchasing Buildings, Missionaries and Inquisitors.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tithe:[ENDCOLOR] Religious Buildings purchased with [ICON_PEACE] Faith gain +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. -10% [ICON_PEACE] Faith costs for purchasing Buildings, Missionaries and Inquisitors.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Religious Courts:[ENDCOLOR] Courthouses generate +3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. -10% [ICON_PEACE] Faith costs for purchasing Buildings, Missionaries and Inquisitors.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Guidance of a Prophet:[ENDCOLOR] Get a free Great Prophet. Holy Sites gain +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]State Religion:[ENDCOLOR] Get a free Great Prophet. All cities with majority religion gain +10 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Blessing of Dalai Lama:[ENDCOLOR] +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from Corporate Offices. The [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism modifier for Shared Religion is increased by 15%.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The Caliphate:[ENDCOLOR] Yield penalties in [ICON_PUPPET] puppeted cities reduced by 30%. +1 local [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] from every Courthouse.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ancient Patriarchate:[ENDCOLOR] May build Ancient Patriarchate (up to 5) in your empire. Ancient Patriarchate gives +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and 20% of Faith purchases is converted into [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

Row.Text: Gain [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from [ICON_PEACE] Faith purchases. Spam out your missionaries to spread your religion as missionaries get an extra spread action and are 100% stronger in conversion strength.

Build the Ancient Patriarchate to get a big boost to your [ICON_PEACE] Faith and gain [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from [ICON_PEACE] Faith purchases. Missionaries get an extra spread action and are 100% stronger in conversion strength.
Ancient Patriarchate
Unlocks four Shinto Shrines. You must build only one of these powerful shrines.
Unlocks four Shinto Shrines. You must build only one of these powerful shrines.
Shrine Foundation

Row.text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Shinto Shrines:[ENDCOLOR] Get the Shrine Foundation in your capital that unlocks four shrines: Inari Shrine (Growth), Hachiman Shrine (War), Tenjin Shrine (Science) and Sengen Shrine (Faith). You may only build one of these.

Row.Text: Inari Shrine gives +50% [ICON_FOOD] Food in all cities. All growth related buildings provide +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Hospital provides +3 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
Build the Inari Shrine if you want more growth and be rewarded for growing your cities.
Inari Shrine

Hachiman Shrine gives +20 Global Experience to all units produced in the empire. Military and defensive buildings provide +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
Build the Hachiman Shrine if you want more veteran units and be rewarded for building up your military and defenses.
Hachiman Shrine
Tenjin Shrine gives +15% [ICON_RSEAERCH] Science to all your cities. All science related buildings provide +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] GAP.
Build the Tenjin Shrine if you want more science in your cities and be rewarded for keeping up your science infrastructure.
Tenjin Shrine
Senge Shrine gives Holy Sites +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. All Shrines and Temples provide +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
Build the Sengen Shrine if you want make your holy sites stronger and get more [ICON_FAITH] Faith from your Shrines and Temples..
Sengen Shrine

Row.text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rule of God:[ENDCOLOR] Capital gains +10 of all yields. May purchase Great Musicians with [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Divine Revelation:[ENDCOLOR] Holy Sites gain +10 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science. Religious Buildings purchased with [ICON_PEACE] Faith gain +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Shaman-King:[ENDCOLOR] Unique promotion (Shaman Blessing A or Shaman Blessing B) given to Armor, Archer and Helicopter units to boost units offensiveness. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A: Ignores ZoC and gets +1 [ICON_ARROW_RIGHT] Movements. +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] CS when attacking. 33% to withdraw from battle. +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] CS when in enemy territory. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]B: Ignore ZoC and gets +1 [ICON_ARROW_RIGHT] Movements. +33% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] CS. +33% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] CS when attacking Units above 50 HP. 33% to withdraw from battle.

Row.Text: Shaman Blessing A
Ignore ZoC and gets +1 [ICON_ARROW_RIGHT] Movements. +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] CS when attacking. 33% to withdraw from battle. +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] CS when in enemy territory.
Shaman Blessing A
Shaman Blessing B
Ignore ZoC and gets +1 [ICON_ARROW_RIGHT] Movements. +33% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] CS. +33% [ICON_RANGE_STRENGTH] CS when attacking Units above 50 HP. 33% to withdraw from battle.
Shaman Blessing B
